FuncDef:
The register-packet-checksum command configures a Router to calculate the checksum based on all contents in a Register message.
The undo register-packet-checksum command configures a Router to calculate the checksum based on the header in a Register message only. The register-packet-checksum command configures a Router to calculate the checksum based on all contents in a Register message. The undo register-packet-checksum command configures a Router to calculate the checksum based on the header in a Register message only. By default, the checksum is calculated based on all contents in a Register message.
ParentView: VPN instance PIM view,PIM view of a public network instance
